name: Powered by React
description: Our Template is Perfect for all devices. It is made by React Structure. React JS was designed to provide high performance in mind.

name: Reusable Components
description: All the components of this template are reusable. We made keystroke using functional components. You can reuse any components.

name: Sass Available
description: Sass is more stable, powerful, and elegant because it is an extension of CSS. So, it is easy for designers and developers to work more efficiently.

name: Fully Responsive Layout
description: All the pages of this template are responsive. We used the Bootstrap framework to build the website. It’s the best in class.

name: 21+ Resourceful Pages
description: All the pages are created based on real content that you will need to run your business. Change image and text and you’re good to go!

name: Fast Loading Speed
description: Website speed is very important. Hence we’ve created Abstrak in a way that your website will load fast, and you will get better performance.

name: Font Awesome 5 Pro Icons
description: This template comes with licensed premium quality icons from FontAwesome. All the icons are font based and ready to match the quality of any HQ screen.

name: Google Font
description: A vast collection of Google fonts are integrated with the template. You can use any of them that goes with your branding.

name: Lifetime Update
description: Purchase our template only once and get lifetime updates. We keep updating our products to stay up to date with the latest trends and technology.
